Notes:Category.Notes:Note: This is the data object used by Lib:connection to determine which scripts a body should execute upon login, quit (logout) or linkdie (disconnect). If you/your team/your theatre wishes to have your own custom login stuff, simply create three properties, (theatre id):login (theatre id):logout (theatre id):linkdie - in this object, which contain a mapping in the shape, ([ (woe:name:for:object) : ({ "script to run", "other script to run, if any" }), (woe:name:for:other:object) : ({ "scripts in other object" }) ]) -Kalle.
